data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Roscommon. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Roscommon, Ireland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Roscommon, Ireland.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 64 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Roscommon hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Roscommon who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Roscommon words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Roscommon to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Roscommon to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary:
the state of Roscommon, Ireland has a population of 64,600.

We estimate Roscommon has 1,004 people who might know Jesus, 58,044 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,552 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who need Jesus.
